main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in various locations between the years 1947 and 1950, including Los Alamos, New Mexico.
interesting points: One sighting described a bright, elliptical object observed over Los Alamos, New Mexico, with details about its size, speed, and motion.
Another report mentioned an aluminum-colored object with erratic and rapid maneuvering, unconventional propulsion, and no sound or exhaust.
The UFO was reported to have unparalleled speed, maneuverability, and stability of observing.
Witnesses observed the UFO's ability to hover and accelerate rapidly, as well as its sudden disappearance in haze.
The documents were part of Project Blue Book and were declassified after 12 years.
location: Los Alamos, New Mexico and other locations
